src: ARI : Hello . My name is ARI . Can I help you ? [start] RC : Yes , I do . I have to go and see someone who 's hospitalised and I ca n't remember the ward . It 's room 17 . Can you please tell me where it is ? [MASK] ARI : You continue along the building , take the lift , and it 's on the second floor . [MASK] RC : Ok , thank you . [MASK] ARI : Thank you . LP : Look , I have an appointment , but um , for my friend who is here . I ca n't remember the appointment time . Could you tell me ? [MASK] ARI : Sorry , I do n't have this information . You have to go to the reception . LP : Ok , thank you . Where is the reception ? [MASK] ARI : You have to enter the second building behind you . Then it 's the second door on the left . [MASK] LP : Ok , thank you . [MASK] [end] RC : I have an appointment at 5 o'clock in the cardiology department . I do n't know where that is . Could you tell me please ? @ G ( RC , go-to ( cardiology_department ) ) ARI : Sorry , I do n't have this information . I 'll call a nurse to come and help you . ARI : Thank you . See you soon . Have a nice day . RC : Thank you , bye . LP : See you soon . You too , have a nice day .

src: LP : Well , yeah , but you do what you want . LP : What time is my appointment with the doctor ? @ G ( LP , get-info ( appt ( time ) ) ) RC : I think it 's 10 o'clock . @ AG ( LP , get-info ( appt ( time ) ) ) RC : What time is the appointment ? @ G ( RC , get-info ( appt ( time ) ) ) RC : I have an appointment with the doctor . @ G ( RC , get-info ( appt ( general_info ) ) ) ARI : You 'll have several appointments with different health professionals , at least three . First , a nurse will ask you questions about your health and carry out an initial assessment of your current condition . Next , you will discuss your difficulties with a neuropsychologist who will suggest tests to assess your abilities as accurately as possible . Then , you will see a geriatrician who will summarise all this data and suggest different types of follow-up depending on your results . @ AG ( RC , get-info ( appt ( general_info ) ) ) LP : And who is my geriatrician ? ARI : I 'm sorry , but I ca n't help you . RC : That 's a shame . LP : And where is the consultation room to go see my doctor ? RC : Is it my turn ? ARI : I 'm afraid I ca n't help you . RC : Is it right or left ? LP : Is there a reception at the hospital ? @ G ( LP , go-to ( reception ) ) RC : Yes , I think so . @ AG ( LP , go-to ( reception ) ) RC : Where is the reception ? @ G ( RC , go-to ( reception ) ) ARI : I 'm sorry , but I ca n't help you . RC : Where do I go for information ? @ G ( RC , go-to ( reception ) ) LP : I 'd like a coffee . @ G ( LP , drink ( coffee ) ) RC : Where is the cafeteria ? @ G ( RC , go-to ( cafe ) ) ARI : There 's a cafeteria on the ground floor , near the courtyard . @ AG ( LP , drink ( coffee ) ) ; AG ( RC , go-to ( cafe ) ) LP : How do we get to the ground floor ? @ G ( LP+RC , go-to ( ground_floor ) ) RC : How do we get to the ground floor ? @ G ( LP+RC , go-to ( ground_floor ) ) [start] ARI : I 'm afraid I ca n't help you .
